meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive James Brown Kristen Schroeder Don Meals Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5992.

td.p: James Brown, a university administrator from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Kristen Schroeder, an audiologist from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Don Meals, an environmental scientist from Burlington, Vermont (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,199)

tr.td: ESCAPE
RUN
FLEA
TAKE A POWDER
GET "OUT" WHILE YOU CAN
HERE COME THE MONSTERS!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1814, before the British burned the White House, this woman escaped with silver & other valuables')

tr.td: In 1814, before the British burned the White House, this woman escaped with silver & other valuables
